Segment.name: L1
Segment.comment: To specify rate and charges detail relative to a line item including freight charges, advances, special charges, and entitlements

Field.name: LadingLineItemNumber
Field.comment: Sequential line number for a lading item

Field.name: FreightRate
Field.comment: Rate that applies to the specific commodity

Field.name: RateValueQualifier1
Field.comment: Code qualifying how to extend charges or interpret value

Field.name: Charge
Field.comment: For a line item: freight or special charge; for the total invoice: the total charges -- expressed in the standard monetary denomination for the currency specified

Field.name: Advances
Field.comment: Incidental charges occurring during transportation which are not generally considered to be freight charges (examples - stop charges, diversion and reconsignment, icing) expressed in the standard monetary denomination for the currency specified

Field.name: PrepaidAmount
Field.comment: Money paid at point of origin (usually by shipper) expressed in the standard monetary denomination for the currency specified

Field.name: RateCombinationPointCode
Field.comment: The code denoting the connecting station for a joint rate obtained by combining two or more published rates which are used for the calculation of transportation charges

Field.name: SpecialChargeOrAllowanceCode
Field.comment: Code identifying type of special charge or allowance

Field.name: RateClassCode
Field.comment: Code identifying specifically designated class of goods; Note: For international air shipments, see IATA Resolution 600k

Field.name: EntitlementCode
Field.comment: Code identifying entitlement party

Field.name: ChargeMethodOfPayment
Field.comment: Code defining method of payment

Field.name: SpecialChargeDescription
Field.comment: Identification of special charge; this data element is used whenever an applicable code cannot be found in data element 150

Field.name: TariffApplicationCode
Field.comment: Code indicating to which traffic a tariff applies

Field.name: DeclaredValue
Field.comment: Monetary assigned value expressed in the standard monetary denomination for the currency specified

Field.name: RateValueQualifier2
Field.comment: Code qualifying how to extend charges or interpret value

Field.name: LadingLiabilityCode
Field.comment: Code identifying limits of liability

Field.name: BilledRatedAsQuantity
Field.comment: Basis for rating (miles, value, volume, etc.); Note: Weight may be defined by either data element 220 or 81

Field.name: BilledRatedAsQualifier
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of quantity or value on which the rate or item pricing is based

Field.name: Percent
Field.comment: Percentage expressed as a decimal

Field.name: CurrencyCode
Field.comment: Code (Standard ISO) for country in whose currency the charges are specified

Field.name: Amount
Field.comment: Monetary amount

Field.name: LadingValue
Field.comment: Value of shipment for export, expressed in the standard monetary denomination for the currency specified
